entities.label: Case PTF/026/06 - Investigation of Walter Cabrera
Department of Peacekeeping Operations - Communications and Information Technology Section
Regulation 1.2(i) - Prohibition against improper communication of proprietary information

edges.label: 1. Subject of Investigation
edges.tooltip: Mr. Walter Cabrera was investigated for potential misconduct in the procurement process.

edges.label: 2. Involvement in Procurement
edges.tooltip: The investigation focused on the procurement processes within DPKO CITS.

edges.label: 3. Alleged Favoritism
edges.tooltip: Allegations included potential favoritism towards TCIL in the procurement process.

edges.label: 4. Bid Resubmission Request
edges.tooltip: Mr. Cabrera requested resubmission from La Cresta to meet bid requirements.

edges.label: 5. Expedited Approval Allegation
edges.tooltip: Alleged expedited approval request for Thunderbird LLC without proper documentation.

edges.label: 6. Communication with Procurement Division
edges.tooltip: Maintained dialogue with PD regarding procurement decisions.

edges.label: 7. Applicable Regulation
edges.tooltip: The investigation considered potential violations of Regulation 1.2(i).

Walter Cabrera: Expedited approval request for Thunderbird LLC without proper documentation.
Distorted communication to cancel the initial bid for laptops.
Improper handling of bid clarification and resubmission request to La Cresta.
Involvement in bid cancellation and re-bidding despite La Cresta's compliant status.
